verses.padam: - Padam yat|EkEna|saṅqsthApayatIti̍# saM - sthApayati|yajñasya̍|santa̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai|avicCEdAyEtyavi̍# - CEdAya|aindrAḥ|paśavaḥ|yE|muṣkarAḥ|yat|aindrAḥ|santa̍ḥ|agniBya̍ ityagni - Byaḥ|AlaByanta ityA̱ - laByantE̱|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|samadamiti# sa - mada̱m|dadhAti|AgnEyIḥ|triṣṭuBaḥ|yAjyAnuvAkyA̍# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyA̱ḥ|kuryAt|yat|AgnEyIḥ|tEna|AgnEyAḥ|yat|triṣṭuBa̍ḥ|tEna̍|aindrAḥ|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|na|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|samadamiti# sa - mada̱m|dadhAti|vAyavE̱|niyutvata̍ iti# ni-yutvatE|tUparam|Eti̍|laBatE|tEja̍ḥ|agnEḥ|vAyuḥ|tEja̍sE|Eṣaḥ|Eti̍|laByatE|tasmA̱t|yadriya~g̍|vAyuḥ|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yadEkEna̍ saṅ sthApayati̍ yajñasya saMtatyA̍ avicCEdAyaindrAḥ̍ paśavO yE muṣkarA̍ yadaindrAḥ santO&gniBya# AlaByantE# dEvatA̱Byaḥ samadaM̍ dadhAtyAgnEyIstriṣṭuBO# yAjyAnuvAkyA̱ḥ kuryAd-yadA̱gnEyIstEnA̱ &&*gnEyA yat triṣṭuBastEnaindrAḥ samRuddhyai̍ na dEvatA̱Byaḥ samadaM̍ dadhAti vAyavE# niyutvatE̍ tUparamA laBatE̍ tEjO&gnErvAyustEjasa̍ Eṣa A laByatE̍ tasmA̱d-yadriya~g̍ vAyu - [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam vAti|tadriya~g̍|agniḥ|dahati|svam|Eva|tat|tEja̍ḥ|anviti̍|Eti|yat|na|niyutva̍ta̍ iti# ni - yutvatE|syAt|uditi̍|mAdyEt|yaja̍mAnaḥ|niyutva̍ta̍ iti# ni - yutvatE|Bavati|yaja̍mAnasya|anu̍nmAdAyEtyanu̍t̍ - mAdAya|vAyumatI iti# vAyu - matI̱|śvEtavatI̍ iti# śvEta - vatI|yAjyAnuvAkyE# iti# yAjyA - anuvAkyE̱|Bavataḥ|satEjastvAyEti# satEjaḥ - tvAya|hiraṇyagarBa̍ iti# hiraṇya - garBaḥ|samiti|avartata|agrE̱|iti̍|AGAramityA̱̍ - GAram|Eti|GArayati|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|vai|hiraṇyagarBa iti# hiraṇya - garBaḥ|prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|anurUpatvAyEtyanurUpa̍ - tvAya|sarvA̍ṇi|vai|Eṣaḥ|rUpAṇi̍|paśUnAm|prati̍|Eti̍|laByatE|yat|śmaśruṇaḥ|tat|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rvAti# tadriya~g~ga-gnirda̍hati̍ svamEva tat tEjO&nvEti̍ yanna niyutvatE̍ syAdunmA̱dyEd-yajamAnO̍ niyutvatE̍ Bavati yajamAnasyA&*nu̍nmAdAya̍ vAyumatI̱ śvEtavatI̍ yAjyAnuvAkyE# Bavataḥ satEjastvAya# hiraṇyagarBaḥ samavartatAgra̍ ityAGAramA̍ GArayati̍ prajApatirvai̍ hiraṇyagarBaḥ̍ prajApatEranurUpatvAya̍ sarvAṇi̍ vA Eṣa rUpAṇi# paśUnAM pratyA laByatE̍ yacCmaśruṇastat̍ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam puruṣAṇAm|rUpam|yat|tUparaḥ|tat|aśvA̍nAm|yat|anyatO̍dannityanyata̍ḥ̍ - dann|tat|gavA̱m|yat|avyA̱ḥ|iva|śaPAḥ|tat|avInAm|yat|ajaḥ|tat|ajAnA̱m|vAyuḥ|vai|paśUnAm|priyam|dhAma̍|yat|vAyavya̍ḥ|Bava̍ti|Etam|Eva|Enam|aBIti̍|sa~jjAnAnA̍ iti# saM - jAnAnAḥ|paśavaḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhantE|vAyavya̍ḥ|kAryA(3)ḥ|prAjApatyA(3)̍ iti# prAjA - patyA(3)ḥ|iti|Ahuḥ|yat|vAyavya̱m|kuryAt|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|iyAt|yat|prAjApatyamiti# prAjA - patyam|kuryAt|vAyOḥ|3 (50)
verses.samhita: puruṣAṇAṃ̍ rUpaM ~Myat tUparastadaśvA̍nAM̍ ~MyadanyatOdan̍ tad-gavAM ~MyadavyA# iva śaPAstadavInAM̍ ~MyadajastadajAnA̱M ~MvAyurvai paśUnAM̍ priyaM dhAma yad-vAyavyO̍# BavatyEtamEvaina̍maBi̍ sajAMnAnAḥ̍ paśava upa# tiṣṭhantE vAyavyaḥ̍ kAryA(3)ḥ prAjApatyA(3)̍ ityAhu-ryad-vA̍yavya̍M̍ kuryAt prajApatEriyAdyat̍ prAjApatyaM̍ kuryAd- vAyO - [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam iyAt|yat|vAyavyaḥ|paśuḥ|Bava̍ti|tEna̍|vAyOḥ|na|Eti|yat|prAjApatya̍ iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|purOḍAśaḥ|Bava̍ti|tEna̍|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|na|Eti|yat|dvAdaśakapAla̍ iti dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlaḥ|tEna|vaiśvAnarAt|na|Eti|AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA̍ - vaiṣṇavam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-̍ kapAlam|niriti|vapati|dIkṣiṣyamA̍ṇaḥ|agniḥ|sarvA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|viṣṇu̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|ca|Eva|yajñam|ca|Eti̍|raBatE|agniḥ|avamaḥ|dEvatA̍nAm|viṣṇu̍ḥ|paramaḥ|yat|AgnAvaiṣṇavamityA̱gnA̍ - vaiṣṇavam|EkAdaśakapAlamityEkA̍daśa-kapAlam|nirvapatIti̍# niḥ - vapati|dEvatA̱ḥ|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -riyAd-yad-vA̍yavya̍ḥ̍ paśurBavati̍ tEna# vAyOrnaiti yat prAjApatyaḥ̍ purOḍAśO̍ Bavati̍ tEna# prAjApatErnaiti̍ yad dvAdaśakapAlastEna̍# vaiśvAnarAnnaityA̱gnA vaiṣṇavamEkAdaśa-kapAlaM̍ nirvapati̍ dIkṣiṣyamAṇO&gniḥ̍ sarvA# dEvatA viṣṇuryajñO̍ dEvatA̱ścaiva yajñaM cA&&* raBatE&gnira̍vamO̍ dEvatAnAM̍ ~Mviṣṇuḥ̍ paramO yadA̱gnA-vaiṣṇava-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati dEvatA# - [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|uBayataḥ|parigRuhyEti̍# pari-gRuhya|yaja̍mAnaḥ|avEti̍|rundhE|purOḍAśE̍na|vai|dEvAḥ|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|Adrdhnuvann|caruṇA̱|asminn|yaḥ|kAmayE̍ta|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|RuddhnuyAm|iti̍|saḥ|purOḍAśa̱m|kurvIta|amuṣminn̍|Eva|lOkE|RuddhnOti|yat|aṣṭAka̍pAla̍ ityaṣṭA - kapAlaḥ|tEna|AgnEyaḥ|yat|trikapAla̍ iti# tri - kapAlaḥ|tEna|vaiṣṇavaḥ|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|yaḥ|kAmayEta|asminn|lOkE|RuddhnuyAm|iti̍|saḥ|carum|kurvIta|agnEḥ|GRutam|viṣṇO̱ḥ|taṇḍulAḥ|tasmA̱t|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: EvOBayataḥ̍ parigRuhya yajamAnO&va̍# rundhE purOḍAśEna̍ vai dEvA amuṣmin̍ ~MlOka A̱rddhnuvan caruṇA&smin. yaḥ kAmayEtA&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOka RuddhnuyAmiti̍ sa purOḍAśa̍M̍ kurvItA&muṣminnEva̍ lOka RuddhnOti̍ yadaṣṭAkapAlastEnA̱&&*gnEyO̍ yat trikapAlastEna̍# vaiṣṇavaḥ samRuddhyai̍ yaḥ kAmayEtAsmin̍ ~MlOka RuddhnuyAmiti̍ sa caruM kurvItAgnErGRutaM̍ ~MviṣṇO̱staṇḍulA-stasmA̱ - [ ] 5

verses.padam: - Padam caruḥ|kAryaḥ|asminn|Eva|lOkE|RuddhnOti|Adityaḥ|Bavati|iyam|vai|adi̍tiḥ|asyAm|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|athO̍ iti|asyAm|Eva|adhIti̍|yajñam|tanutE|yaḥ|vai|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|uKya̱m|aBRutvA|agnim|cinutE|yathA̱|sAmi|garBa̍ḥ|avapadya̍ta̍ ityava̍ - padyatE|tAdRuk|Eva|tat|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCEt|vaiśvAnaram|dvAda̍śakapAlamiti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - kapAlam|purastA̱t|niriti|vapEt|saM~Mvathsara̍ iti# saM - vathsaraḥ|vai|agniḥ|vaiśvAnaraḥ|yathA̱|saM~Mvathsaramiti# saM - vathsaram|AptvA|6 (50)
verses.samhita: -ccaruḥ kAryO̱&sminnEva lOka RuddhnOtyAdityO̍ BavatI̍ yaM ~MvA aditirasyAmEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhatyathO# asyAmEvAdhi# yajñaM tanutE̍ yO vai saM~MvathsaramuKya-maBRu̍tvA&gniM̍ cinutE̍ yathA# sAmi garBO&vapadya̍tE̍ tAdRugEva tadArtimArcCE̱d-vaiśvAnaraM dvAdaśakapAlaM̍ purastAnnirvapEth̍ saM~MvathsarO vA agnir-vai̱śvAnarO yathA# saMvathsaramAptvA - [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam kAlE|Agata̍ ityA - gatE|vijAyata̍ iti# vi - jAyatE|Evam|Eva|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|AptvA|kAlE|Agata̍ ityA - gatE|agnim|cinutE|na|Arti̱m|Eti|RucCati|EṣA|vai|agnEḥ|priyA|tanUḥ|yat|vaiśvAnaraḥ|priyAm|Eva|asya|tanuva̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|trIṇi̍|EtAni̍|havIṃ̍ ṣi|Bavanti|traya̍ḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EṣAm|lOkAnA̱m|rOhA̍ya||7̍ (38) (yadriya~g̍ vAyu - ryacC^^maśruṇastad̍ - vAyO - rnirvapati̍ dEvatA - stasmA# - dAptvA - ṣṭAtriṃśacca̍ ) (A1)
verses.samhita: kAla AgatE̍ vijAyata̍ EvamEva saM~MvathsaramAptvA̍ kAla AgatE&gniM̍ cinutE̍ nA&&*rtimArcCatyEṣA̍ vA agnEḥ priyA tanUryad-vai̱śvAnaraḥ priyAmEvAsya# tanuvamava# rundhE trIṇyEtAni# havIṃṣi# Bavanti traya# imE lOkA EṣAM ~MlOkAnAṃq rOhAya||7̍

verses.padam: - Padam prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|sRuṣṭvA|prEṇA|anu|prEti̍|aviśat|tABya̍ḥ|puna̍ḥ|saMBa̍vitumiti̍ saM - Bavitum|na|aśaknOt|saḥ|abravIt|Ruddhnavat|it|saḥ|yaḥ|mA|itaḥ|puna̍ḥ|saciMqnavaditi̍# saM - cinavat|iti̍|tam|dEvAḥ|samiti̍|acinvann|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|Ad^^rdhnuvann|yat|samaci̍nvanniti̍# saM - acinvann|tat|citya̍sya|cityatvamiti̍# citya - tvam|yaḥ|Evam|vidvAn|agnim|cinutE|RuddhnOti|Eva|kasmai̱|kam|agniḥ|cIyatE|iti̍|Ahuḥ|agnivAnitya̍gni̍ - vAn|8 (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatiḥ̍ prajAḥ sRuṣṭvA prEṇA&nu prAviśat̍ tAByaḥ punaḥ saMBavituM̍ nAśaknOth̍ sO̱&bravIdRuddhnavadith sa yO mEtaḥ punaḥ̍ saMcinavaditi taM dEvAḥ samacinvan̍ tatO vai ta A̱rddhnuvanq yath samacinvan̍ taccityasya̍ cityatvaM ~Mya EvaM ~MvidvAnagniM cinuta̍ RuddhnOtyEva kasmai kamagniścIyata̍ ityAhuragnivA̍ - [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam asAni|iti|vai|agniḥ|cIyatE|agnivAnitya̍gni̍ - vAn|Eva|Bavati|kasmai̱|kam|agniḥ|cIyatE|iti|Ahuḥ|dEvAḥ|mA|vEdann|iti̍|vai|agniḥ|cIyatE|viduḥ|Enam|dEvAḥ|kasmai̱|kam|agniḥ|cIyatE|iti̍|Ahuḥ|gRuhI|asAni|iti̍|vai|agniḥ|cIyatE|gRuhI|Eva|Bavati|kasmai̱|kam|agniḥ|cIyatE|iti̍|Ahuḥ|paśumAniti̍# paśu - mAn|asAni|iti|vai|agniḥ|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -nasAnIti̍ vA agniścIyatE̍ &gnivAnEva Bavati̍ kasmai kamagniścIyata̍ ityAhurdEvA̍ mA# vEdanniti vA agniścIyatE̍ vidurEnaM̍ dEvAḥ kasmai kamagniścIyata̍ ityAhurgRuhya̍sAnIti̍ vA agniścIyatE̍ gRuhyEva̍ Bavati̍ kasmai kamagniścIyata̍ ityAhuḥ̍ paśumAnasAnIti̍ vA agni - [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam cIyatE|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|Eva|Bavati|kasmai̱|kam|agniḥ|cIyatE|iti|Ahuḥ|sapta|mA|puru̍ṣAḥ|upEti̍|jIvAn|iti̍|vai|agniḥ|cIyatE|traya̍ḥ|prA~jca̍ḥ|traya̍ḥ|pratya~jca̍ḥ|AtmA|saptamaḥ|EtAva̍ntaḥ|Eva|Enam|amuṣminn̍|lOkE|upEti̍|jIvanti|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|agnim|acikIṣata|tam|pRuthivI|abravIt|na|mayi|agnim|cEṣyasE|atIti̍|mA|dhakṣyati|sA|tvA|atidahyamAnEtya̍ti̍ - dahyamAnA|vIti̍|dhaviṣyE|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ścIyatE̍ paśumAnEva Bavati̍ kasmai kamagniścIyata̍ ityAhuḥ̍ sapta mA puruṣA̍ upa# jIvAniti vA agniścIyatE̍ trayaḥ prA~jcastrayaḥ̍ pratya~jca# AtmA saptama̍ EtAvanta̍ Evainamamuṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOka upa# jIvanti prajApatiragnima̍cikIṣata̍ taM pRuthivya̍bravInna̍ mayyagniM cE̱ṣyasE&ti# mA dhakṣyati sA tvA&tidahyamA̍nA̍ vi dhaviṣyE̍ - [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam saḥ|pApIyAn|Baviṣyasi|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|tathA̱|vai|aham|kariṣyAmi|yathA̱|tvA|na|atidhakṣyatItya̍ti-dhakṣyati̍|iti̍|saḥ|imAm|aBIti̍|amRuśat|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|tvA|sAdayata|tayA̱|dEvatayA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda|iti̍|imAm|Eva|iṣṭa̍kAm|kRutvA|upEti̍|adhatta|ana̍tidAhAyEtyana̍ti̍ - dAhAya|yat|pratIti|agnim|cinvIta|tat|aBIti̍|mRuśEt|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|tvA|sAdayatu|tayA̱|dEvatayA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sa pApIyAn̍ BaviṣyasIti sO̱&bravIt tathA vA ahaM kariṣyAmi̍ yathA̱ tvA nAtidhakṣyatIti̍ sa imAmaByamRuśat̍ prajApatistvA̍ sAdayatu tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad̍ dhruvA sIdEtImAmEvEṣṭakAM̍ kRutvOpA-dhattA-na̍tidAhAya̍ yat pratyagniM cinvIta̍ tadaBi mRuśEt̍ prajApatistvA̍ sAdayatu tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad̍ dhruvA sIdE - [ ] 11

verses.padam: - Padam iti|imAm|Eva|iṣṭa̍kAm|kRutvA|upEti̍|dhattE|ana̍tidAhAyEtyana̍ti̍ - dAhAya|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|akAmayata|prEti|jAyEya|iti̍|saḥ|Etam|uKya̱m|apaśyat|tam|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|abiBaḥ|tataḥ|vai|saḥ|prEti̍|ajAyata|tasmA̱t|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM-vathsaram|BAryaḥ|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|tam|vasa̍vaḥ|abruvann|prEti̍|tvam|ajaniṣṭhAḥ|vayam|prEti̍|jAyAmahai|iti̍|tam|vasu̍Bya̍ iti vasu# - Byaḥ|prEti|ayacCat|tam|trIṇi̍|ahA̍ni|abiBaruḥ|tEna̍|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tImAmEvEṣṭakAM̍ kRutvOpa# dhattE&natidAhAya̍ prajApatirakAmayata̍ prajAyEyEti̍ sa EtamuKyamapaśyat̍ taṃ saM~Mvathsarama̍biBastatO̍# vai sa prAjAyata̍ tasmA̱th saM~MvathsaraM BAryaḥ̍ praiva jAyatE̍ taM ~MvasavO&bruvan̍ pra tvamajaniṣṭhA̍ vayaM prajAyAmahA̍ iti taM ~MvasuByaḥ̍ prAyacCat̍ taM trIṇyahA̱nyabiBarustEna - [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam trIṇi|ca|śatAti̍|asRu̍janta|traya̍striṃśatamiti̍ trayaḥ-̍ triṃqśatam|ca|tasmA̱t|tryahamiti# tri - aham|BAryaḥ|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|tAn|rudrAḥ|abruvann|prEti̍|yUyam|ajaniḍhvam|vayam|prEti̍|jAyAmahai|iti̍|tam|rudrEBya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ayacCann|tam|ṣaṭ|ahA̍ni|abiBaruḥ|tEna̍|trIṇi̍|ca|śatAni̍|asRu̍janta|traya̍striṃśatamiti̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśatam|ca|tasmA̱t|ṣaḍahamiti# ṣaṭ - aham|BAryaḥ|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|tAn|AdityAḥ|abruvann|prEti̍|yUyam|ajaniḍhvam|vayam|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: trIṇi# ca śatAnyasRujanta̍ trayastriṃśataM̍ ca tasmA̱t tryahaM BAryaḥ̍ praiva jAyatE̍ tAn rudrA abruvan̍ pra yUyamajaniḍhvaM̍ ~MvayaM prajAyAmahA̍ iti taṃ rudrEByaḥ prAyacCan̍ taṃ ṣaḍahA̱nyabiBarustEna trIṇi# ca śatAnyasRujanta̍ trayastriṃśataM̍ ca tasmA̱th ṣaḍahaM BAryaḥ̍ praiva jAyatE̍ tAnAdityA̍ abruvan̍ pra yUyamajaniḍhvaM̍ ~MvayaM - [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam prEti|jAyAmahai|iti̍|tam|AdityEBya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ayacCann|tam|dvAda̍śa|ahA̍ni|abiBaruḥ|tEna̍|trIṇi̍|ca|śatAni̍|asRu̍janta|traya̍striṃśatamiti̍ trayaḥ̍ - triṃqśatam|ca|tasmA̱t|dvAdaśAhamiti# dvAdaśa - aham|BAryaḥ|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|tEna̍|vai|tE|sahasra̱m|asRujanta|uKAm|sahasratamImiti̍# sahasra - tamIm|yaḥ|Evam|uKya̱m|sAhasram|vEda|prEti̍|sahasra̱m|paśUn|ApnOti||14̍ (40) (agnivAn - paśumAna̍sAnIti̍ vA agni - rddhaviṣyE̍ - mRuśEt prajApatistvA̍ sAdayatu tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasva̍ dhruvA sIda̍ - tEna - tAnAdityA̍ abruvan̍ pra yUyamajaniḍhvaM̍ ~MvayaM - catvAriṃqśacca̍)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: pra jAyAmahA̍ iti tamAdityEByaḥ̍ prAyacCan̍ taM dvAdaśAhA̱nyabiBarustEna trIṇi# ca śatAnyasRujanta̍ trayastriṃśataM̍ ca tasmA̱d dvAdaśAhaM BAryaḥ̍ praiva jAyatE̍ tEna vai tE sahasramasRujantOKAṃ̍ sahasratamIM̍ ~Mya EvamuKyaṃ# sAhasraM ~MvEda pra sahasraM̍ paśUnA̱pnOti||14 (agnivAn - paśumAna̍sAnIti̍ vA agni - rddhaviṣyE̍ - mRuśEt prajApatistvA̍ sAdayatu tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasva̍ dhruvA sIda̍ - tEna - tAnAdityA̍ abruvan̍ pra yUyamajaniḍhvaM̍ ~MvayaM - catvAriṃqśacca̍)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yajuṣA|vai|EṣA|kriyatE|yaju̍ṣA|pacyatE|yaju̍ṣA|vIti̍|mucyatE|yat|uKA|sA|vai|EṣA|Etaṛhi̍|yAtayAmnIti̍# yAta - yAmnI|sA|na|punaḥ|prayujyEti̍# pra - yujyA̱|iti|Ahuḥ|agnE̱|yukṣva|hi|yE|tava̍|yukṣva|hi|dEvahUta̍mAniti̍# dEva - hUtamAn|iti̍|uKAyA̱m|juhOti|tEna̍|Eva|EnAm|puna̍ḥ|prEti̍|yu~gktE|tEna̍|ayA̍tayAmnItyayA̍ta̍ - yAmnI|yaḥ|vai|agnim|yOgE̱|Agata̍ ityA - gatE|yunakti|yu~gktE|yu~jjAnEṣu̍|agnE̱|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajuṣA̍ vA EṣA kriyatE̍ yajuṣA̍ pacyatE yajuṣA̍ vi mucyatE̍ yaduKA sA vA Eṣaitaṛhi# yAtayA̱mnI sA na punaḥ̍ prayujyEtyAhuragnE̍# yukṣvA hi yE tava# yukṣvA hi dEvahUta̍mAṃq̍ ityuKAyA̱M juhOti tEnaivainAM punaḥ prayu~gktE̍ tEnAyAtayAmnI̍ yO vA agniM ~MyOga AgatE̍ yunakti# yu~gktE yu~jjAnEṣvagnE̍# - [ ] 15

verses.padam: - Padam yukṣva|hi|yE|tava|yukṣva|hi|dEvahUta̍mAniti̍# dEva - hUtamAn|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|yOga̍ḥ|tEna̍|Eva|Enam|yunakti|yu~gktE|yu~jjAnEṣu̍|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|nya~g̍|agniḥ|cEtavyA(3)ḥ|uttAnA(3)̍ ityut̍ - tAnA(3)ḥ|iti|vaya̍sAm|vai|Eṣaḥ|pratimayEti̍# prati - mayA̱|cIyatE|yat|agniḥ|yat|nya~jcam|cinuyAt|pRuṣṭitaḥ|Enam|Ahu̍taya̍ ityA - hutayaḥ|RucCEyuḥ|yat|uttAnamityut-tAnam|na|pati̍tum|śaknuyAt|asu̍vargya̍ ityasuvaḥ-gyaḥ|asya|syAt|prAcIna̱m|uttAnamityu̍t-tAnam|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yukṣvA hi yE tava# yukṣvA hi dEvahUta̍mAṃq̍ ityAhaiṣa̍ vA agnEryOgastEnaivainaM̍ ~Myunakti yu~gktE yu~jjAnEṣu̍# brahmavAdinO# vadanti nya~g~gagniścE̍tavyA(3)̍ uttAnA(3)̍ iti vayasAM̍ ~MvA Eṣa pratimayA̍# cIyatE yadagniryannya~jcaM̍ cinuyAt pRuṣṭita̍ EnamAhu̍taya̍ RucCEyuryaduttAnaM̍ na patituṃ̍ śaknuyAdasuvargyO&sya̍ syAt prAcInamuttAnaM̍ - [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam puruṣaśIrq.ṣamiti# puruṣa-śIrq.ṣam|upEti|dadhAti|muKataḥ|Eva|Enam|Ahu̍taya̍ ityA - hutayaḥ|RucCanti|na|uttAnamityut-̍ tAnam|cinutE|suvargya# iti# suvaḥ - gyaḥ|asya|Bavati|sauryA|juhOti|cakṣu̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|pratIti̍|dadhAti|dviḥ|juhOti|dvE̍ iti|hi|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|samAnyA|juhOti|samAnam|hi|cakṣu̍ḥ|samRu̍ddhyA̍ iti saM - Ruddhyai|dEvAsurA iti# dEva - asurAḥ|saM~MyattA̍ iti saM - yattAḥ|Asann|tE|vAmam|vasu|sam|nIti̍|adadhata|tat|dEvAḥ|vAmaBRutEti̍# vAma - BRutA̱|avRu~jjata|tat|vAmaBRuta iti# vAma - BRutaḥ|vAmaBRuttvamiti̍# vAmaBRut - tvam|yat|vAmaBRutamiti# vAma - BRuta̱m ( )|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|vAmam|Eva|tayA̱|vasu̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyasya|vRu~gktE|hira̍ṇyamUd^^rdhnIti̍ hiraṇya̍ - mUd^^rdhnI|Bavati|jyOtiḥ|vai|hira̍ṇyam|jyOti̍ḥ|vAmam|jyOti̍ṣA|Eva|asya|jyOti̍ḥ|vAmam|vRu~gktE|dviyajuriti̍# dvi-yajuḥ|Bavati|pratiṣṭhityA̍ iti prati-sthityai||17̍ (74) (yu~jjAnEṣvagnE̱ - prAcInamuttAnaM̍ - ~MvAmaBRutaM̍ - caturviṃśatiśca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: puruṣaśIrq.ṣamupa̍# dadhAti muKata EvainamAhutaya̍ RucCanti nOttAnaM cinutE̍ suvargyO̱&sya Bavati sauryA juhOti̍ cakṣurEvAsmin̍ prati# dadhAti dvirjuhOti̍ dvE hi cakṣuṣI̍ samAnyA juhOti̍ samAnaṃ hi cakṣuḥ samRuddhyai̍ dEvAsurAḥ saM~MyattA̍ Asan tE vAmaM ~Mvasu saM nyadadhata̍ taddEvA vAmaBRutA̍&vRu~jjata̍ tadvAmaBRutO̍# vAmaBRuttvaM ~MyadvAmaBRuta̍# ( ) mupadadhAti̍ vAmamEva tayA vasu yajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyasya̍ vRu~gktE hiraṇyamUrddhnI̍ Bavati jyOtirvai hiraṇyaM̍ jyOtirvAmaM̍ jyOtiṣaivAsya̍ jyOtirvAmaM̍ ~MvRu~gktE̍ dviyajurBavati̍ pratiṣṭhityai||17̍ (yu~jjAnEṣvagnE̱-prAcInamuttAnaM̍ - ~MvAmaBRutaM̍ - caturviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam Apaḥ|varu̍ṇasya|patna̍yaḥ|Asann|tAḥ|agniḥ|aBIti̍|addhyAyat|tAḥ|samiti̍|aBavat|tasya̍|rEta̍ḥ|parEti̍|apatat|tat|iyam|aBavat|yat|dvitIya̱m|parApa̍taditi̍# parA - apatat|tat|asau|aBavat|iyam|vai|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|asau|svarAḍiti# sva - rAṭ|yat|virAjAviti# vi - rAjau̱|upadadhAtItyupa-dadhA̍ti|imE̍ iti|Eva|upEti̍|dhattE|yat|vai|asau|rEta̍ḥ|si~jcati̍|tat|asyAm|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|tat|prEti̍|jAyatE|tAḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ApO varuṇasya̍ patnaya̍ Asan tA agniraByaddhyAyat̍ tAḥ samaBavat̍ tasya rEtaḥ parA&patat̍ tadiyamaBavadyad̍ dvitIyaM̍ parA&patat̍ tadasAvaBavadiyaM̍ ~Mvai virAḍasau svarAḍ yad-virAjAvupadadhA̍tImE̍ EvOpa# dhattE yadvA asau rEtaḥ̍ si~jcati tadasyAM prati# tiṣṭhati tat pra jAyatE̍ tA OṣadhayO̍ - [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam vIrudhaḥ|Bavanti|tAḥ|agniḥ|atti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|prEti̍|Eva|jAyatE|annAda̍ ityanna̍ - adaḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|rEtasvI|syAt|prathamAyA̱m|tasya|cityA̱m|uBE̍ iti|upEti̍|daddhyAt|imE̍ iti|Eva|asmai|samIcI̍ iti|rEta̍ḥ|si~jcataḥ|yaḥ|siktarE̍tA̍ iti# sikta - rEtAḥ|syAt|prathamAyA̱m|tasya|cityA̱m|anyAm|upEti̍|daddhyAt|uttamAyAmityu̍t-tamAyA̱m|anyAm|rEta̍ḥ|Eva|asya|siktam|AByAm|uBayata̍ḥ|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|saM~Mvathsaramiti̍# saM - vathsaram|na|kam|19 (50)
verses.samhita: vIrudhO# Bavanti tA agniratti̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda praiva jAyatE&nnAdO̍ Bavati̍ yO rEtasvI̍ syAt prathamAyAM̍ tasya cityAmuBE̍ upa# daddhyAdimE EvAsmai# samIcI rEtaḥ̍ si~jcatO yaḥ siktarEtAḥ̍ syAt prathamAyAM̍ tasya cityAmanyAmupa̍# daddhyAduttamAyAmanyAṃ̍ rEta# EvAsya# siktamAByAmuBayataḥ̍ pari# gRuhṇAti saM~MvathsaraM na ka - [ ] 19

verses.padam: - Padam cana|pratyavarOhEditi̍# prati - avarOhEt|na|hi|imE̍ iti|kam|cana|pratyavarOha̍ta̍ iti# prati - avarOhataḥ|tat|EnayOḥ|vratam|yaḥ|vai|apa̍śIṛṣAṇamityapa̍# - śIṛqṣAṇam|agnim|cinutE|apaśIrq.ṣEtyapa̍# - śIṛqṣA|amuṣminn|lOkE|Bavati|yaḥ|saśI̍ṛṣAṇamiti̍ sa - śIṛqṣAṇam|cinutE|saśIrq.ṣEti sa - śIṛqṣA|amuṣminn|lOkE|Bavati|citti̱m|juhOmi|mana̍sA|GRutEna̍|yathA̱|dEvAḥ|iha|AgamannityA̱̍ - gamann|vItihO̱trA̍ iti# vIti - hOtrAḥ|RutAvRudha ityRuta̍ - vRudhaḥ|samudrasya̍|vayuna̍sya|patmann̍|juhOmi̍|viśvaka̍rmaṇa̍ iti# viśva - karmaṇE|viśvA̱|ahA̱|amartyam|haviḥ|iti̍|svayamAtRuṇṇAmiti̍# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAm|upadhAyEtyupa̍ - dhAya|juhOti|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~jcana pratyavarOhEnna̍ hImE ka~jcana pratyavarOha̍tastadE̍nayOrvrataM̍ ~MyO vA apa# śIṛṣAṇamagniM cinutE&pa̍śIṛṣA&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE Bavati̍ yaḥ saśIṛṣAṇaM̍ cinutE saśIṛṣA̍ &muṣmin̍ ~MlOkE Bavati̍ cittiM̍ juhOmi manasA̍ GRutEna yathA# dEvA ihA&&*gaman̍ vItihO̱trA RutAvRudhaḥ̍ samudrasya# vayunasya̍ patman̍ juhOmi# viśvakarmaṇE̍ viśvA&hA&martyaṃ̍ haviriti# svayamAtRuṇṇAmupadhAya̍# juhOtyE - [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam Etat|vai|agnEḥ|śiraḥ|saśI̍ṛṣAṇamiti̍ sa - śIṛqṣAṇam|Eva|agnim|cinutE|saśIṛqṣEti sa - śIṛqṣA|amuṣminn|lOkE|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|suvargAyEti̍# suvaḥ - gAya|vai|Eṣaḥ|lOkAya̍|cIyatE|yat|agniḥ|tasya̍|yat|aya̍thApUrvamityaya̍thA̍ - pUrvam|kriyatE̱|asuvargyamityasu̍vaḥ-gyam|asya|tat|suvagya̍# iti# suvaḥ - gyaḥ|agniḥ|citi̱m|upadhAyEtyu̍pa̍ - dhAya|aBIti̍|mRuśEt|citti̱m|aci̍ttim|cinavat|vIti̍|vidvAn|pRuṣṭhA|iva|vItA|vRujinA|ca|martAn̍|rAyE|ca|naḥ|svapatyAyEti̍# su - apatyAya# ( )|dEva|diti̱m|ca|rAsva|adi̍tim|uruṣya|iti̍|yathApUrvamiti̍# yathA - pUrvam|Eva|EnAm|upEti|dhattE|prA~jca̱m|Enam|cinutE|suvargya̍# iti# suvaḥ - gyaḥ|asya|Bavati||21̍ (68)
verses.samhita: tadvA agnEḥ śiraḥ saśIṛṣAṇamEvAgniM̍ cinutE̍ saśIṛṣA&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE Bavati̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda# suvargAya vA Eṣa lOkAya# cIyatE yadagnistasya yadayathApUrvaM̍ kriyatE &suvargyamasya̍ tath suvargyO̱̍ &gniścitimupadhAyABi̍ mRuśEccittimaci̍ttiM̍ cinavadvi vidvAn pRuṣṭhEva# vItA vRujinA̍ ca martA̱n rAyE ca# naḥ svapatyAya# ( ) dEva ditiM̍ ca rAsvA-ditimuruṣyEti̍# yathApUrvamEvainAmupa# dhattE prA~jcamEnaM̍ cinutE suvargyO̱&sya Bavati||21

verses.padam: - Padam viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|diśAm|patiḥ|saḥ|naḥ|paśUn|pAtu|saḥ|asmAn|pAtu|tasmai̱|nama̍ḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|rudraḥ|varuṇaḥ|agniḥ|diśAm|pati̍ḥ|saḥ|naḥ|paśUn|pAtu|saḥ|asmAn|pAtu|tasmai̱|nama̍ḥ|EtAḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|EtEṣA̱m|paśUnAm|adhi̍pataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|tAByaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|Eti̍|vRuścyatE|yaḥ|paśuśIrq.ṣAṇIti̍# paśu - śIrq.ṣAṇi|upadadhAtItyu̍pa̍ - dadhAti|hiraṇyEṣṭakA̍ iti# hiraṇya - iṣṭakAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|EtABya̍ḥ|Eva|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|nama̍ḥ|karOti|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: viśvakarmA̍ diśAM patiḥ sa naḥ̍ paśUn pAtu̍ sO̱&smAn pAtu̍ tasmai namaḥ̍ prajApatI̍ rudrO varuṇO̍ &gnirdiśAM patiḥ sa naḥ̍ paśUn pAtu̍ sO̱&smAn pAtu̍ tasmai nama# EtA vai dEvatA# EtEṣA̱M paśUnA-madhipataya-stAByO̍ vA Eṣa A vRuścyatE̍ yaḥ paśuśIrq.ṣAṇyu̍pa̍ dadhAti̍ hiraṇyEṣṭakA upa# dadhAtyEtABya# Eva dEvatA̱ByO namaskarOti̍ brahmavAdinO# - [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam vadanti|agnau|grAmyAn|paśUn|prEti|dadhAti|śucA|AraṇyAn|arpayati|kim|tata̍ḥ|uditi̍|śiṃqṣati|iti̍|yat|hiraṇyEṣṭakA̍ iti# hiraṇya - iṣṭakAḥ|upadadhAtItyupa-dadhA̍ti|amRuta̱m|vai|hira̍ṇyam|amRutE̍na|Eva|grAmyEBya̍ḥ|paśuBya̍ iti# paśu - Byaḥ|BEṣajam|karOti|na|EnAn|hinasti|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|prathamA|svayamAtRuṇṇEti# svayaM - AtRuṇṇA|vyAna iti# vi - anaḥ|dvitIyA̱|apAna ityapa-anaḥ|tRutIyA̱|anu̍|prEti̍|anyAt|prathamAm|svayamAtRuṇṇAmiti̍# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAm|upadhAyEtyupa̍ - dhAya|prAṇEnEti̍# pra - anEna|Eva|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|samiti|ad^^rdhayati|vIti̍|anyAt|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vadantyagnau grAmyAn paśUn pra dadhAti̍ śucA&&raṇyAnarpayati̍ kiM tata ucCiṃṣatIti̍ yaddhiraṇyEṣṭakA̍ upadadhA̱tyamRutaM̍ ~Mvai hiraṇyamamRutE̍naiva̍ grAmyEByaḥ̍ paśuByO# BEṣajaM karOti̍ nainAn# hinasti prAṇO vai prathamA̍ svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ vyAnO dvitIyA&pAnastRutIyA&nu̍ prA&*ṇyA̱t prathamAṅ svayamAtRuṇṇAmu̍padhAya̍# prAṇEnaiva prAṇaṃ samarddhayati̍ vyanyAd̍ - [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam dvitIyA̱m|upadhAyEtyupa̍ - dhAya|vyAnEnEti̍# vi - anEna|Eva|vyAnamiti̍# vi - anam|samiti|ad^^rdhayati|apEti̍|anyAt|tRutIyA̱m|upadhAyEtyu̍pa̍ - dhAya|apAnEnEtya̍pa̍ - anEna|Eva|apAnamitya̍pa̍ - anam|samiti|ad^^rdhayati|athO̍ iti|prAṇairiti̍# pra - anaiḥ|Eva|Enam|samiti|indhE|BUḥ|Buva̍ḥ|suva̍ḥ|iti̍|svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ iti# svayaM-AtRuṇṇAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|imE|vai|lOkAḥ|svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ iti# svayaM-AtRuṇṇAḥ|EtABiḥ|Kalu̍|vai|vyAhRu̍tIBiriti̍ vyAhRuti̍ - Biḥ|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prEti|ajAyata|yat|EtABi̍ḥ|vyAhRu̍tIBiriti̍ vyAhRuti̍ - Biḥ|svayamAtRuṇṇA iti# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAḥ|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|imAn|Eva|lOkAn|upadhAyEtyu̍pa̍ - dhAya|Eṣu|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dvitIyAmupadhAya̍# vyAnEnaiva vyAnaṃ samarddhayatyapA̱n̍ yAttRutIyAmupadhAyA̍-pAnEnaivApAnaṃ̍ samarddhayatyathO̱̍ prAṇairEvainaṃq samindhE̍ BUrBuvaḥ suvariti# svayamAtRuṇṇA upa# dadhAtImE vai lOkAḥ svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ EtABiḥ Kaluvai vyAhRutIBiḥ̍ prajApatiḥ̍ prA*&jAyata̍ yadEtABirvyAhRutIBiḥ̍ svayamAtRuṇṇA upadadhA̍tImAnEva̍ lOkAnupadhAyaiṣu̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam lOkEṣu|adhi̍|prEti̍|jAyatE|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|vyAnAyEti̍# vi - anAya|apAnAyEtya̍pa̍ - anAya|vAcE|tvA|cakṣu̍ṣE|tvA|tayA̱|dEvata̍yA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda|agninA̱|vai|dEvAḥ|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|ajigAṃqsann|tEna|pati̍tum|na|aśaknuvann|tE|EtAḥ|cata̍sraḥ|svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ iti# svayaM - atRuṇṇAḥ|apaśyann|tAḥ|dikṣu|upEti|adadhata|tEna̍|sarvata̍ścakṣuṣEti̍# sarvataḥ̍ - cakṣuṣA|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Ayann|yat|catasraḥ|svayamAtRuṇṇA̍ iti# svayaM - AtRuṇṇAḥ|dikṣu|upadadhAtItyupa̍ - dadhAti|sarvata̍ścakṣuṣEti̍# sarvataḥ̍ - cakṣuṣA|Eva|tat|agninA̱|yajamAnaḥ̍ ( )|suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|Eti||25 (53)
verses.samhita: lOkEṣvadhi prajAyatE̍ prAṇAya# vyAnAyApAnAya̍# vAcE tvA cakṣuṣE̍ tvA tayA# dEvatayA&~ggirasvad̍ dhruvA sIdAgninA̍ vai dEvAḥ suvargaM̍ ~MlOkamajigAṃsan̍ tEna patituM̍ nAśaknuvan̍ ta EtAścatasraḥ̍ svayamAtRuṇṇA apaśyan̍ tA dikṣUpAdadhata̍ tEna# sarvataścakṣuṣA̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamAyanq̍ yaccatasraḥ̍ svayamAtRuṇṇA dikṣUpadadhA̍ti̍ sarvataścakṣuṣaiva̍ tadagninA yajamAnaḥ̍ ( ) suvargaM ~MlOkamEti||25̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|Eti|yAhi|vItayE̱|iti̍|Aha|ahva̍ta|Eva|Enam|agnim|dUtam|vRuṇImahE|iti̍|Aha|hUtvA|Eva|Enam|vRuṇItE|agninA̱|agniḥ|samiti̍|iddhyatE|iti̍|Aha|samiti̍|indhE|Eva|Enam|agniḥ|vRutrAṇi̍|ja~gGanat|iti̍|Aha|sami̍ddha̍ iti saM - iddhE|Eva|asminn|indriyam|dadhAti|agnEḥ|stOma̱m|manAmahE|iti|Aha|manutE|Eva|Enam|EtAni̍|vai|ahnA̱m|rUpAṇi̍|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agna A yAhi̍ vItaya ityAhA-hvataivaina̍-magniM̍ dUtaM ~MvRuṇImaha̍ ityAha̍ hUtvaivainaM̍ ~MvRuṇItE &gninA&gniḥ samiddhyata̍ ityAha̍ samindha̍ EvainamagnirvRutrAṇi̍# ja~gGanadityAha̍ samiddha̍ EvAsminnindriyaM̍ dadhAtyagnEḥ̍ stOmaM̍ manAmaha ityAha̍ manuta EvainamEtAni̍ vA ahnAṃ# rUpAṇya# - [ ] 26

verses.padam: - Padam anvahamityanu̍ - aham|Eva|Enam|cinutE|avEti|ahnA̱m|rUpAṇi̍|rundhE|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|yAtayA̱mnIriti̍# yAta - yAmnIḥ|anyAḥ|iṣṭakAḥ|ayA̍tayAmnItyayA̍ta-yAmnI|lOkapRuMqṇEti̍# lOkaM - pRuṇA|iti|aindrAgnItyai̱ndra-agnI|hi|bAṛqhaspatyA|iti̍|brUyAt|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra - agnI|ca|hi|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspatiḥ|ca|ayA̍tayAmAna̍ ityayAta̍ - yAmAnaḥ|anucaravatItyanucara̍ - vatI|Bavati|ajAmitvAyEtyajA̍mi-tvAya|anuṣṭuBEtya̍nu̍ - stuBA̱|anviti|carati|AtmA|vai|lOkapRuMqṇEti̍# lOkaM - pRuṇA|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|anuṣṭubityanu̍ - stup|tasmA̱t|prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|sarvAṇi|a~ggA̍ni|anviti̍|carati|tAḥ|asya|sUda̍dOhasa̍ iti sUda# - dOhasaḥ|27 (50)
verses.samhita: -nvahamEvainaM̍ cinutE &vAhnAṃ# rUpAṇi# rundhE brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAdyAtayA̱mnIranyA iṣṭakA̍ ayAtayAmnI̍ lOkaM pRuṇEtyai̱ndrAgnI hi bAṛhaspatyEti̍# brUyAdindrAgnI ca hi dEvAnAM bRuhaspatiścA-yAtayAmAnO̍ &nucaravatI̍ BavatyajAmitvAyA̍ -nuṣṭuBA&nu# caratyAtmA vai lOkaM̍ pRuṇA prAṇO# &nuṣṭup tasmA̱t prAṇaḥ sarvAṇya~ggAnyanu# carati tA asya̍ sUdadOhasa̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|tasmA̱t|paru̍ṣiparuṣIti̍ paruṣi̍ - paruṣi|rasaḥ|sOma̱m|śrIṇanti|pRuśna̍yaḥ|iti̍|Aha|anna̱m|vai|pRuśni̍|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|arkaḥ|vai|agniḥ|arkaḥ|anna̱m|anna̱m|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|janmann̍|dEvAnA̱m|viśa̍ḥ|triṣu|Eti̍|rOcanE|divaḥ|iti̍|Aha|imAn|Eva|asmai|lOkAn|jyOti̍ṣmataḥ|karOti|yaḥ|vai|iṣṭa̍kAnAm|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|vEda|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|tayA̱̍ ( )|dEvatayA|a~ggirasvat|dhruvA|sIda|iti̍|Aha|EṣA|vai|iṣṭa̍kAnAm|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati||28̍ (66)
verses.samhita: ityAha̍ tasmAt paruṣiparuṣi̍ rasaḥ sOmaṅ# śrIṇanti pRuśnaya̍ ityAhAnnaM ~Mvai pRuśnyannamEvAva̍# rundhE&rkO vA agnirarkO&nnamannamEvAva̍# rundhE janman̍ dEvAnAM ~MviśastriṣvA̍ rOcanE̍ diva ityAhEmAnEvAsmai̍# lOkAn jyOtiṣmataḥ̍ karOti yO vA iṣṭakAnAM̍ pratiṣṭhAM ~MvEda pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ tayA# ( ) dEvatayA&~ggirasvad̍ dhruvA sIdEtyAhaiṣA̍ vA iṣṭakAnAM̍ pratiṣṭhA ya EvaM ~MvEda pratyEvatiṣṭhati||28̍

verses.padam: - Padam suvargAyEti# suvaḥ - gAya|vai|Eṣaḥ|lOkAya̍|cIyatE|yat|agniḥ|vajra̍ḥ|EkAdaśinI̱|yat|agnau|EkAdaśinI̱m|minuyAt|vajrE̍ṇa|Enam|suvargAditi̍# suvaḥ - gAt|lOkAt|antaḥ|daddhyAt|yat|na|minuyAt|svaruBiriti̍ svaru-Biḥ|paśUn|vIti̍|ad^^rdhayEt|EkayUpamityE̍ka̍ - yUpam|minOti|na|Enam|vajrEṇa|suvargAditi̍# suvaḥ - gAt|lOkAt|antardadhAtItyantaḥ̍ - dadhAti|na|svaru̍Biriti̍ svaru-Biḥ|paśUn|vIti̍|ad^^rdhayati|vIti̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|indriyEṇa̍|vIryE̍ṇa|RuddhyatE|yaḥ|agnim|cinvann|adhikrAmatItya̍dhi̍ - krAmati|aindriyA|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suvargAya vA Eṣa lOkAya# cIyatE yadagnirvajra# EkAdaśinI yadagnAvEkAdaśinI̱M̍ minuyAd-vajrEṇainaṃ̍ suvargAllOkAdantardaddhyAdyanna̍ minuyAth̍ svaruBiḥ̍ paśUn vyarddhayEdEkayUpaM̍ minOti̍ nainaM ~MvajrEṇa̍ suvargAllOkAdantardadhA̍ti̍ na svaruBiḥ̍ paśUn vyarddhayati̍ vi vA Eṣa indriyEṇa̍# vIryEṇarddhyatE̍ yO̱&gniM cinva-nnadhikrAma̍tyaindriya̍ - [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam RucA|AkramaṇamityA̱̍ - kramaṇam|pratIti̍|iṣṭa̍kAm|upEti̍|daddhyAt|na|indriyEṇa̍|vIryE̍ṇa|vIti̍|RuddhyatE|rudraḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|tasya̍|tisraḥ|śaravyA̱ḥ|pratIcI̱|tiraścI̱|anUcI̱|tABya̍ḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|Eti̍|vRuścyatE|yaḥ|agnim|cinutE|agnim|citvA|tisRudhanvamiti̍# tisRu - dhanvam|ayAcitam|brAhmaṇAya̍|dadyAt|tABya̍ḥ|Eva|nama̍ḥ|karOti|athO̍ iti|tABya̍ḥ|Eva|AtmAna̱m|niriti̍|krIṇItE|yat|tE|rudra|puraḥ|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -rcA &&kramaṇaM̍ pratIṣṭakAmupa̍# daddhyAnnEndriyEṇa# vIryEṇa̍ vyRuddhyatE̍ rudrO vA Eṣa yadagnistasya# tisraḥ śaravyA̱ḥ̍ pratIcI# tiraścyanUcI tAByO vA Eṣa A vRuścyatE̍ yO̱&gniM cinutE̱̍ &gniM citvA tisRudhanvamayA̍citaM̍ brAhmaṇAya# dadyAt tABya# Eva namaskarOtyathO̍ tABya# EvA&&tmAnaM niṣkrIṇItE̍ yattE# rudra purO - [ ] 30

verses.padam: - Padam dhanuḥ|tat|vAta̍ḥ|anviti̍|vAtu|tE|tasmai̱|tE|rudra|saM~MvathsarEṇEti̍# saM - vathsarEṇa|nama̍ḥ|karOmi|yat|tE|rudra|dakṣiṇA|dhanu̍ḥ|tat|vAta̍ḥ|anviti̍|vAtu|tE|tasmai̱|tE|rudra|parivathsarEṇEti̍# pari - vathsarEṇa|nama̍ḥ|karOmi|yat|tE|rudra|paścAt|dhanu̍ḥ|tat|vAta̍ḥ|anviti̍|vAtu|tE|tasmai̱|tE|rudra|idAvathsarEṇa̍|nama̍ḥ|karOmi|yat|tE|rudra|uttarAdityu̍t̍ - tarAt|dhanuḥ|tat|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dhanustad-vAtO anu# vAtu tE tasmai# tE rudra saM~MvathsarEṇa namaskarOmi̍ yattE# rudra dakṣiṇA dhanustad-vAtO anu# vAtu tE tasmai# tE rudra parivathsarEṇa namaskarOmi̍ yattE# rudra paścAddhanustad-vAtO anu# vAtu tE tasmai# tE rudrEdAvathsarEṇa namaskarOmi̍ yattE# rudrOttarAddhanusta - [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam vAtaḥ|anviti̍|vAtu|tE|tasmai̱|tE|rudra|iduvathsarEṇEtI̍du-̍ vathsarEṇa|nama̍ḥ|karOmi|yat|tE|rudra|upari̍|dhanu̍ḥ|tat|vAta̍ḥ|anviti̍|vAtu|tE|tasmai̱|tE|rudra|vathsarEṇa̍|nama̍ḥ|karOmi|rudraḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|agniḥ|saḥ|yathA̱|vyAGraḥ|kruddhaḥ|tiṣṭha̍ti|Evam|vai|Eṣaḥ|Etaṛhi̍|sa~jci̍tamiti̍ saM - citam|Etaiḥ|upEti|tiṣṭhatE|namaskArairiti̍# namaḥ-kAraiḥ|Eva|Enam|śamayati|yE|agnayaḥ|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dvAtO anu# vAtu tE tasmai# tE rudrEduvathsarEṇa namaskarOmi̍ yattE# rudrOpari dhanustad-vAtO anu# vAtu tE tasmai# tE rudra vathsarEṇa namaskarOmi̍ rudrO vA Eṣa yadagniḥ sa yathA̱ vyAGraḥ kruddhastiṣṭhatyEvaM̍ ~MvA Eṣa Etaṛhi sa~jcitamEtairupa̍# tiṣṭhatE namaskArairEvainaṃ# śamayati yE̱&gnayaḥ̍ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam purIṣyA̱ḥ|praviṣṭA̍ iti pra - viṣṭAḥ|pRuthivIm|anu||tEṣA̱m|tvam|asi|uttama̍ ityut̍ - tamaḥ|prEti|naḥ|jIvAta̍vE|suva||Apa̱m|tvA|agnE|mana̍sA|Apa̱m|tvA|agnE|tapa̍sA|Apa̱m|tvA|agnE|dIkṣayA̱|Apa̱m|tvA|agnE|upasadBirityu̍pasat̍ - Biḥ|Apa̱m|tvA|agnE|sutyayA̱|Apa̱m|tvA|agnE|dakṣiṇABiḥ|Apa̱m|tvA|agnE|avaBRuthEnEtya̍va̍ - BRuthEna|Apa̱m|tvA|agnE|vaśayA̱|Apa̱m|tvA|agnE|svagAkArEṇEti̍# svagA - kArEṇa|iti̍|Aha̍ ( )|EṣA|vai|agnEḥ|Aptiḥ|tayA̱|Eva|Enam|ApnOti||33̍ (58)
verses.samhita: purIṣyA̱ḥ praviṣṭAḥ̍ pRuthivImanu|tEṣAM̍ tvamasyuttamaḥ̍ praṇO# jIvAtavE̍ suva||ApaM̍ tvA&gnE manasA &&paM̍ tvA&gnE tapasA &&paM̍ tvA&gnE dIkṣayA &&paM̍ tvA&gna upasadBirApaM̍ tvA&gnE sutyayA&&paM̍ tvA&gnE dakṣiṇABirApa̍M̍ tvA&gnE &vaBRuthEnApaM̍ tvA&gnE vaśayA &&paM̍ tvA&gnE svagAkArEṇEtyAhai̍ ( ) ṣA vA agnErAptistayaivainamApnOti||33̍

verses.padam: - Padam gAyatrEṇa|purastA̱t|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|bRuhadrathantarAByAmiti# bRuhat - rathantarAByA̱m|pakṣau|Ojaḥ|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|RutusthAya̍jñAyajñiyE̍na|pucCa̱m|Rutuṣu̍|Eva|pratIti̍|tiṣṭhati|pRuṣṭhaiḥ|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|tEja̍ḥ|vai|pRuṣṭhAni̍|tEja̍ḥ|Eva|asminn|dadhAti|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|agnim|asRujata|saḥ|asmAt|sRuṣṭaḥ|parA~g|ait|tam|vAravantIyEnEti̍# vAra - vantIyEna|avArayata|tat|vAravantIyasyEti̍# vAra - vantIyasya|vAravantIyatvamiti̍# vAravantIya - tvam|śyaitEna|śyEtI|akuruta|tat|śyaitasya̍|śyaitatvamiti̍# śyaita - tvam|34 (50)
verses.samhita: gAyatrEṇa# purastAdupa# tiṣṭhatE prAṇamEvAsmin̍ dadhAti bRuhad-rathaMtarAByA̱M pakṣAvOja# EvAsmin̍ dadhAtyRutusthAyajñA-yajñiyE̍na̍ pucCamRutuṣvEva̍ prati# tiṣṭhati pRuṣṭhairupa# tiṣṭhatE tEjO vai pRuṣṭhAni tEja# EvAsmin̍ dadhAti prajApatiragnima̍sRujata̍ sO̱&smAth sRuṣṭaḥ parA~gait̍ taM ~MvAravantIyE̍nA-vArayata̍ tad-vAravantIya̍sya̍ vAravantIyatvaṅ śyaitEna# śyEtI akuruta̍ tacCyaitasya# śyaitatvaM - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam yat|vAravantIyEnEti# vAra - vantIyEna|upatiṣṭha̍ta̍ ityupa̍ - tiṣṭhatE|vAraya̍tE|Eva|Enam|śyaitEna̍|śyEtI|kurutE|prajApa̍tEṛhRuda̍yEna|apipakṣamitya̍pi̍ - pakṣam|prati|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|prEmAṇa̱m|Eva|asya|gacCati|prAcyA̱|tvA|diśA|sAdayAmi|gAyatrEṇa̍|Canda̍sA|agninA̱|dEvata̍yA|agnEḥ|śIrṣṇA|agnEḥ|śira̍ḥ|upEti̍|dadhAmi|dakṣi̍ṇayA|tvA|diśA|sAdayAmi|traiṣṭu̍BEna|Canda̍sA|indrE̍ṇa|dEvata̍yA|agnEḥ|pakṣEṇa̍|agnEḥ|pakṣam|upEti̍|dadhAmi|pratIcyA̱|tvA|diśA|sAdayAmi|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~Myad-vAravantIyE̍nOpatiṣṭha̍tE̍ vArayata̍ aivainaṅ# śyaitEna# śyEtI kurutE̍ prajApatEṛhRuda̍yEnA-pipakṣaM̍ pratyupa# tiṣṭhatE prEmAṇamEvAsya̍# gacCati prAcyA̱ tvA diśA sAdayAmi̍ gAyatrEṇa CandasA&gninA̍# dEvatayA&gnEḥ̍ śIrṣṇAgnEḥ śira upa# dadhAmi dakṣiṇayA̍ tvA diśA sAdayAmi̍ traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasEndrEṇa̍ dEvatayA&gnEḥ̍ pakṣEṇAgnEḥ pakṣamupa# dadhAmi pratIcyA̱ tvA diśA sAdayAmi̍ - [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam jAgatEna|Canda̍sA|savitrA|dEvata̍yA|agnEḥ|pucCE̍na|agnEḥ|pucCa̱m|upEti̍|dadhAmi|udI̱cyA|tvA|diśA|sAdayAmi|Anu̍ṣṭuBEnEtyAnu̍# - stuBEna|CandasA|mitrAvaru̍ṇAByAmiti̍# mitrA-varuṇAByAm|dEvata̍yA|agnEḥ|pakṣEṇa̍|agnEḥ|pakṣam|upEti̍|dadhAmi|Ud^^rdhvayA̱|tvA|diśA|sAdayAmi|pA~gktE̍na|Canda̍sA|bRuhaspati̍nA|dEvata̍yA|agnEḥ|pRuṣṭhEna̍|agnEḥ|pRuṣṭham|upEti̍|dadhAmi|yaḥ|vai|apA̱tmAnamityapa̍-AtmAnam|agnim|cinutE|apAtmEtyapa̍# - AtmA|amuṣminn|lOkE|Bavati|yaḥ|sAtmA̍namiti̍ sa - AtmAnam|cinutE ( )|sAtmEti sa-AtmA|amuṣminn|lOkE|Bavati|AtmEṣṭakA̍ ityA̱tma-iṣṭakAḥ|upEti|dadhAti|Eṣaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|AtmA|sAtmA̍namiti̍ sa-AtmAnam|Eva|agnim|cinutE|sAtmEti sa - AtmA|amuṣminn|lOkE|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍||36̍ (72) (śyaitatvaM - pratIcyA̱ tvA diśA sAdayAmi̍ - yaḥ sAtmAnaM̍ cinutE - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: jAgatEna̍ CandasA̍ savitrA dEvatayA&gnEḥ̍ pucCEnAgnEḥ̍ pucCamupa# dadhAmyudI̱cyA tvA diśA sAdayAmyAnu̍ṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA̍ mitrAvaruṇAByAM̍ EvatayA&gnEḥ̍ pakṣEṇAgnEḥ pakṣamupa# dadhAmyUrddhvayA̱ tvA diśA sAdayAmi̍ pA~gktEna̍ CandasA̍ bRuhaspatinA̍ dEvatayA&gnEḥ̍ pRuṣṭhEnAgnEḥ pRuṣṭhamupa# dadhAmi yO&vA apA̱tmAnamagniM cinutE&pA̱tmA&muṣmi̍n̍ ~MlOkE Bavati̍ yaḥ sAtmAnaM̍ cinutE ( ) sAtmA&muṣmin̍ ~MlOkE BavatyAtmEṣṭakA̍ upa# dadhAtyEṣa vA agnErAtmA sAtmAnamEvAgniM̍ cinutE̍ sAtmA&muṣmin̍ ~MlOkE Bavati̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda||36̍ (śyaitatvaM - pratIcyA̱ tvA diśA sAdayAmi̍ - yaḥ sAtmAnaM̍ cinutE - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnE̱|udadha ityuda̍ - dhE|yA|tE|iṣuḥ|yuvA|nAma̍|tayA̱|naḥ|mRuḍa|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|nama̍ḥ|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|upEti̍|jIva̍ntaḥ|BUyAsma|agnE̱|duddhra|gahya|kiṃqśila|vanya|yA|tE|iṣu̍ḥ|yuvA|nAma̍|tayA̱|naḥ|mRuḍa|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|nama̍ḥ|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|upEti̍|jIva̍ntaḥ|BUyAsma|pa~jca̍|vai|EtE|agnaya̍ḥ|yat|cita̍yaḥ|udadhirityu̍da̍ - dhiḥ|Eva|nAma|prathamaḥ|duddhraḥ|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agna# udadhE yA ta iṣuryuvA̍ nAma tayA# nO mRuḍa tasyA̱stE namastasyA̱sta upa jIvantO̍ BUyAsmAgnE# duddhra gahya kiṃśila vanya yA ta iṣuryuvA̍ nAma tayA# nO mRuḍa tasyA̱stE namastasyA̱sta upa jIvantO̍ BUyAsma pa~jca vA EtE̱&gnayO yaccitaya̍ udadhirEva nAma# prathamO duddhrO - [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam dvitIyaḥ|gahya̍ḥ|tRutIya̍ḥ|kiṃqśilaḥ|caturthaḥ|vanya̍ḥ|pa~jcamaḥ|tEBya̍ḥ|yat|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|na|juhuyAt|addhvaryum|ca|yajamAnam|ca|prEti̍|dahEyuḥ|yat|EtAḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|juhOti|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|Eva|EnAn|śamayati|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|addhvaryuḥ|na|yaja̍mAnaḥ|vAk|mE|Asann|nasOḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|akṣyOḥ|cakṣuḥ|karṇa̍yOḥ|śrOtra̱m|bAhuvOḥ|bala̱m|UruvOḥ|Oja̍ḥ|ari̍ṣṭA|viśvA̍ni|a~ggA̍ni|tanUḥ|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dvitIyO gahyastRutIya̍ḥ̍ kiṃśilaścaturthO̍ vanyaḥ̍ pa~jcamastEByO yadAhutIrna̍ juhuyAda̍ddhvaryuM̍ ca yajamAnaM̍ ca pra dahEyuryadEtA̍ AhutIrjuhOti̍# BAgadhEyEnaivainA̱~jCamayati̍ nA&&*rtimArcCatyaddhvaryurna̍ yajamAnO̍ vA~gma# Asan nasOḥ prAṇO̱&kṣyOścakṣuḥ karṇayOḥ̍ śrOtraM̍ bAhuvOrbala-mUruvOrOjO&ri̍ṣṭA̍ viśvAnya~ggAni̍ tanU - [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam tanuvA̱|mE|saha|namaḥ|tE|astu|mA|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|apEti̍|vai|EtasmA̱t|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|krAmanti|yaḥ|agnim|cinvann|adhikrAmatItyadhi̍ - krAmati|vAk|mE|Asann|nasOḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|iti|Aha|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|Atmann|dhattE|yaḥ|rudra ḥ|agnau|yaḥ|aPsvityap̍ - su|yaḥ|OṣadhIṣu|yaḥ|rudraḥ|viśvA̱|Buva̍nA|AvivEśEtyA̱̍ - vivEśa|tasmai̱|rudrAya̍|nama̍ḥ|astu|Ahu̍tiBAgA̍ ityAhuti̍ - BAgAḥ|vai|anyE|rudrAḥ|havirBAgA̍ iti# haviḥ - BAgAḥ|39 (50)
verses.samhita: -stanuvA# mE saha namastE̍ astu mA mA# hiṃsIrapa vA EtasmA̱t prAṇAḥ krAmanti̍ yO̱&gniM cinvannadhi̍ krAmati̍ vA~gma# Asan nasOḥ prAṇa ityAha̍ prAṇAnEvA*&&tman dhattE̍ yO rudrO agnau yO aPsu ya OṣadhIṣu̍ yO rudrO viśvA BuvanA&&vivEśa̍ tasmai# rudrAya namO# astvAhutiBAgA̍ vA anyE rudrA havirBAgA̍ - [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam anyE|śatarudrIyamiti# śata - rudrIya̱m|hutvA|gAvIdhukam|carum|EtEna|yaju̍ṣA|caramAyA̱m|iṣṭa̍kAyAm|nIti̍|daddhyAt|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|Eva|Enam|śamayati|tasya̍|tu|vai|śatarudrIyamiti̍# śata - rudrIya̱m|hutam|iti|Ahuḥ|yasya̍|Etat|agnau|kriyatE̱|iti̍|vasa̍vaḥ|tvA|rudraiḥ|purastA̱t|pAntu|pitara̍ḥ|tvA|yamarA̍jAna̍ iti# yama - rAjAnaḥ|pitRuBiriti# pitRu - Biḥ|dakṣiṇataḥ|pAntu|AdityAḥ|tvA|viśvai̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|paścAt|pAntu|dyutAnaḥ|tvA|mArutaḥ|marudBiriti# marut - Biḥ|uttarata ityut̍ - tarataḥ|pAtu|40 (50)
verses.samhita: anyE śatarudrIyaṃ̍# hutvA gAvIdhukaM̍ carumEtEna yajuṣA̍ caramAyAmiṣṭakAyAM̍ ni daddhyAd-BAgadhEyE̍naivainaṃ̍# śamayati tasya tvai śatarudrIyaṃ̍# hutamityAhuryasyaitadagnau̍ kriyata iti vasavastvA̍ rudraiḥ purastA̱t pAntu pitarastvA̍ yamarAjAnaḥ̍ pitRuBirdakṣiṇataḥ̍ pA̱ntvAdityAstvA viśvai̱rdEvaiḥ paścAt pA̱ntu dyutAnastvA# mArutO marudBiruttarataḥ̍ pAtu̍ - [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|tvA|indrajyEṣṭhA̍ itIndra# - jyEṣṭhAḥ|varuṇarAjAna̍ iti varuṇa̍ - rAjAnaḥ|adhastA̱t|ca|upariṣṭhAt|ca|pAntu|na|vai|EtEna̍|pUtaḥ|na|mEddhya̍ḥ|na|prOkṣi̍ta̍ iti pra - ukṣitaḥ|yat|Enam|ataḥ|prAcIna̱m|prOkṣatIti̍# pra - ukṣati|yath|sa~jci̍tamiti̍ saM - citam|AjyEna|prOkṣatIti̍# pra - ukṣati|tEna̍|pUtaḥ|tEna̍|mEddhya̍ḥ|tEna̍|prOkṣi̍ta̍ iti pra-ukṣitaḥ||41 (32) (dudhra - stanU - rhavirBAgAḥ̍ - pAtu - dvAtriṃśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: dEvAstvEndrajyEṣṭhA̍ varuṇarAjAnO̍ &dhastA̱ccO-pariṣṭhAcca̍ pAntu na vA EtEna# pUtO na mEddhyO na prOkṣitO̍ yadEnamata̍ḥ̍ prAcInaM̍ prOkṣati yath saMcitamAjyE̍na̍ prOkṣati tEna# pUtastEna mEddhyastEna prOkṣitaḥ||41̍ (dudhra - stanU - rhavirBAgAḥ̍ - pAtu - dvAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam samIcI̱|nAma|asi|prAcI̱|dik|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|agniḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|asitaḥ|rakṣitA|yaḥ|ca|adhipatirityadhi̍-patiḥ|yaḥ|ca|gOptA|tAByA̱m|nama̍ḥ|tau|naḥ|mRuḍayatAm|tE|yam|dviṣmaḥ|yaḥ|ca|naḥ|dvEṣṭi̍|tam|vAm|jamBE̱|dadhAmi|OjasvinI̱|nAma̍|asi|dakṣiṇA|dik|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|indra̍ḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|pRudAkuḥ|prAcI̱|nAma̍|asi|pratIcI̱|dik|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saqmIcIq nAmAsi̍ prAcI diktasyA̱stE &gniradhipati̍ rasitO rakṣitA̍ yaścAdhipati̍ ryaśca# gOptA tAByAM namastaunO# mRuḍayatAM tE yaM dviṣmO yaśca# nO dvEṣṭi taM ~MvAM jaMBE# dadhAmyOjasvinI nAmAsi̍ dakṣiṇA dik tasyA̱sta indrO&dhipatiḥ̍ pRudAkuḥ̍ prAcI nAmAsi̍ pratIcI dik tasyA̱stE - [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam sOmaḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|svaja iti# sva - jaḥ|avasthAvEtyava̍ - sthAvA̱|nAma|asi|udI̍cI|dik|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|varu̍ṇaḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍-patiḥ|tiraśva̍rAjiriti̍# tiraśva-rAjiḥ|adhi̍patnItyadhi̍-patnI|nAma̍|asi|bRuhatI|dik|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|śvitraḥ|vaśinI̱|nAma|asi|iyaM|dik|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|yamaḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍-patiḥ|kalmAṣa̍grIva̍ iti# kalmAṣa# - grIvaḥ|rakṣitA|yaḥ|ca|adhipatirityadhi̍-patiḥ|yaḥ|ca|gOptA|tAByA̱m|nama̍ḥ|tau|naḥ|mRuḍayatAm|tE|yam|dviṣmaḥ|yaḥ|ca|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sOmO&dhipatiḥ̍ svajO# &vasthAvA nAmA-syudIcI̍ dik tasyA̱stE varuṇO&dhipati-stiraśca̍# rAji-radhipatnI̍ nAmAsi̍ bRuhatI dik tasyA̱stE bRuhaspati-radhipatiḥ̍ śvitrO vaśinI nAmAsIyaM̍ dik tasyA̱stE yamO&dhipatiḥ̍ kalmAṣa# grIvO rakṣitA yaścAdhipati̍ ryaśca# gOptA tAByAM namastau nO# mRuḍayatAM tE yaM dviṣmO yaśca# - [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam naḥ|dvEṣṭi|tam|vAm|jamBE̱|dadhAmi|EtAḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|agnim|citam|rakṣanti|tABya̍ḥ|yat|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|na|juhuyAt|addhvaryum|ca|yajamAnam|ca|dhyAyEyuḥ|yat|EtAḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|juhOti|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga-dhEyEna|Eva|EnAn|śamayati|na|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|addhvaryuḥ|na|yaja̍mAnaḥ|hEtaya̍ḥ|nAma̍|stha|tEṣA̱m|vaḥ|puraḥ|gRuhAḥ|agniḥ|vaḥ|iṣa̍vaḥ|salilaḥ|nilipAM̍ iti# ni-lipAMḥ|nAma|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nO dvEṣṭi taM ~MvAM jaMBE# dadhAmyEtA vai dEvatA# agniM citaṃ rakṣanti̍ tAByO yadAhutIrna̍ juhuyAda̍ddhvaryuM̍ ca yajamAnaM̍ ca dhyAyEyuryadEtA AhutIrjuhOti̍# BAgadhEyEnai-vainA̱~jCamayati̍ nA&&*rtimArcCatyaddhvaryurna̍ yajamAnO̍ hEtayO nAma# stha tEṣA̱M ~Mvaḥ purO gRuhA agnirva iṣavaḥ̍ salilO nilipAM̍ nAma# - [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam stha|tEṣA̱m|vaḥ|dakṣiṇA|gRuhAḥ|pitaraḥ|vaḥ|iṣa̍vaḥ|saga̍raḥ|vajriṇa̍ḥ|nAma̍|stha|tEṣA̱m|vaḥ|paścAt|gRuhAḥ|svapna̍ḥ|vaḥ|iṣa̍vaḥ|gahva̍raḥ|avasthAvA̍na̍ ityava̍ - sthAvAnaḥ|nAma̍|stha|tEṣA̱m|vaḥ|uttarAdityu̍t̍ - tarAt|gRuhAḥ|Apaḥ|vaḥ|iṣa̍vaḥ|samudraḥ|adhi̍pataya̍ ityadhi# - patayaḥ|nAma|stha|tEṣA̱m|vaḥ|upari̍|gRuhAḥ|vaṛqṣam|vaḥ|iṣa̍vaḥ|ava̍svAn|kravyAḥ|nAma̍|stha|pArthi̍vAḥ|tEṣA̱m|vaḥ|iha|gRuhAḥ|45̍ (50)
verses.samhita: stha tEṣA̱M ~MvO dakṣiṇA gRuhAḥ pitarO# va iṣavaḥ̍ sagarO̍ vajriṇO nAma# stha tEṣA̱M ~Mvaḥ paścAd gRuhAḥ svapnO# va iṣavO̍ gahvarO̍ &vasthAvAnO̍ nAma# stha tEṣA̱M ~Mva uttarAd gRuhA ApO# va iṣavaḥ̍ samudrO-&dhipatayO̍ nAma# stha tEṣA̱M ~Mva upari# gRuhA varq.ṣaM ~Mva iṣavO&vasvAn̍ kravyA nAma# stha pArtthivA-stEṣA̱M̍ ~Mva iha gRuhA - [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam anna̱m|vaḥ|iṣavaḥ|nimiṣa̍ iti# ni - miṣaḥ|vAtanAmamiti# vAta - nAmam|tEByaḥ|vaḥ|nama̍ḥ|tE|naḥ|mRuḍayata|tE|yam|dviṣmaḥ|yaḥ|ca|naḥ|dvEṣṭi̍|tam|vaḥ|jamBE̱|dadhAmi|hutAda̍ iti# huta - adaḥ|vai|anyE|dEvAḥ|ahutAda̍ ityahuta̍ - adaḥ|anyE|tAn|agniciditya̍gni̍ - cit|Eva|uBayAn|prIṇAti|daddhnA|madhumiśrEṇEti̍# madhu - miśrEṇa|EtAḥ|Ahu̍tIrityA-hutIḥ|juhOti|BAgadhEyEnEti̍# BAga - dhEyEna|Eva|EnAn|prIṇAti|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|iṣṭa̍kAḥ|vai|dEvAḥ|ahutAda̍ ityahuta̍ - adaḥ|iti̍|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: annaM̍ ~Mva iṣavO̍ &nimiṣO vAtanAmaM̍ tEByO# vO namastE nO# mRuḍayata tE yaM dviṣmO yaśca# nO dvEṣṭi taM ~MvO jaMBE# dadhAmi hutAdO vA anyE dEvA ahutAdO&nyE̍ tAnagnicidEvOBayA̱n̍ prIṇAti daddhnA madhumiśrEṇaitA̍ AhutIrjuhOti̍ BAgadhEyEnaivainA̱n̍ prIṇAtyathO KalvAhuriṣṭa̍kA̍ vai dEvA ahutAda̍ itya# - [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam anuparikrAmamityanu̍ - parikrAma̱m|juhOti|aparivargamityapa̍ri̍ - vargam|Eva|EnAn|prIṇAti|imam|stana̱m|Urjasvantam|dhaya|apAm|prapyA̍tamiti̍ pra-pyAtam|agnE|sarirasya|maddhyE̱||uthsa̱m|juṣasva|madhu̍mantamiti̍ madhu-mantam|Urva|samudriya̱m|sada̍nam|Eti̍|viśasva||yaḥ|vai|agnim|prayujyEti̍# pra - yujya|na|vimu~jcatIti̍# vi - mu~jcati|yathA̱|aśva̍ḥ|yuktaḥ|avi̍mucyamAna̍ ityavi# - mucyamAnaḥ|kṣuddhyann|parABavatIti̍# parA - Bavati|Evam|asya|agniḥ|parEti̍|Bavati|tam|parABava̍ntamiti̍# parA - Bavantam|yaja̍mAnaḥ|anu̍|parEti̍|Bavati|saḥ|agnim|citvA|lUkṣaḥ|47̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -nuparikrAmaM̍ juhOtyaparivargamEvainA̱n̍ prIṇAtImaṅ stanamUrjasvantaM̍ dhayApAM prapyAtamagnE̍ sarirasya maddhyE̱|uthsaM̍ juṣasva madhumantamUrva̍ samudriyaṃq sadanamA̍ viśasva||yO̍ vA agniM prayujya na vimu~jcati̍ yathA&śvO# yuktO&vimucyamAnaḥ̍ kṣuddhyan̍ parABavatyEvama̍syAgniḥ̍ parA# Bavati taM parABava̍ntaM̍ ~MyajamAnO&nu̍ parA# Bavati sO̱&gniM citvA lUkṣO - [ ] 47

verses.padam: - Padam Bavati|imam|stana̱m|Urjasvantam|dhaya|apAm|iti̍|Ajya̍sya|pUrṇAm|sruca̱m|juhOti|Eṣaḥ|vai|agnEḥ|vimOka̍ iti# vi - mOkaḥ|vimucyEti# vi - mucya|Eva|asmai|anna̱m|apIti̍|dadhAti|tasmA̱t|Ahuḥ|yaḥ|ca|Evam|vEda̍|yaḥ|ca|na|sudhAyamiti̍# su - dhAya̱m|ha|vai|vAjI|suhita̍ iti su - hitaḥ|dadhAti|iti|agniḥ|vAva|vAjI|tam|Eva|tat|prIṇAti|saḥ|Enam|prItaḥ|prIṇAti|vasI̍yAn|Bavati̍ ( )||48 (50)
verses.samhita: BavatImaṅ̍ stanamUrjasvantaM̍ dhayApAmityAjyasya̍ pUrṇAṅ srucaM̍ juhOtyEṣa vA agnErvimOkO̍ vimucyaivAsmA annamapi# dadhAti tasmAdAhuryaścaivaM̍ ~MvEda yaśca na sudhAyaṃ# ha vai vAjI suhitO̍ dadhAtItyagnirvAva vAjI tamEva tat prIṇAti̍ sa EnaM̍ prItaḥ prIṇAti̍ vasIyAn̍ Bavati ( )||48

verses.padam: - Padam indrAya|rAjñE̱|sUkaraḥ|varu̍ṇAya|rAjñE̱|kRuṣṇa̍ḥ|yamAya̍|rAjñE̱|Ruśya̍ḥ|RuṣaBAya̍|rAjñE̱|gavayaḥ|śArdUlAya̍|rAjñE̱|gauraḥ|puruṣarAjAyEti̍# puruṣa - rAjAya|markaṭa̍ḥ|kṣipraśyEnasyEti̍# kṣipra - śyEnasya|varti̍kA|nIla̍~ggOḥ|krimi̍ḥ|sOma̍sya|rAjña̍ḥ|kulu~ggaḥ|sindhO̱ḥ|śiṃqśumAra̍ḥ|himava̍ta̍ iti# hima - vataḥ|hastI||49 (28) (indrAya̍ rAjñE - &ṣṭAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A11)
verses.samhita: indrAya̍ rAjñE# sUkarO varuṇAya̍ rAjñE kRuṣṇO# yamAya rAjña Ruśya# RuṣaBAya rAjñE# gavayaḥ śA̱rdUlAya rAjñE# gauraḥ puruṣarAjAya̍# markaṭaḥ̍ kṣipraśyEnasya vartikA̍ nIla~ggOḥ̍ krimiḥ sOmasya̍ rAjñaḥ̍ kulu~ggaḥ sindhO̱ḥ śiṃśumArO# himavatO̍ hastI||49 (indrAya̍ rAjñE-&ṣṭAviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam mayuḥ|prAjApatya iti# prAjA - patyaḥ|Ulaḥ|halI̱kṣṇaḥ|vRuṣadaṃqśaḥ|tE|dhAtuḥ|sarasvatyai|śAri̍ḥ|śyEtA|puruṣavAgiti̍# puruṣa-vAk|sarasvatE|śuka̍ḥ|śyEtaḥ|puruṣavAgiti̍# puruṣa-vAk|Araṇyaḥ|ajaḥ|nakulaḥ|śakA̱|tE|pauṣṇAḥ|vAcE|krau~jcaḥ||50 (23) (mayu - strayOviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: mayuḥ prAjApatya̍ UlO halI̱kṣṇO vRuṣadaṃqśastE dhAtuḥ sarasvatyai̍ śAriḥ̍ śyEtA puruṣavAK̍ sarasvatE̍ śukaḥ̍ śyEtaḥ puruṣavAgA̍raṇyO̍&jO̍ nakulaḥ̍ śakA tE pauṣṇA vAcE krau~jcaḥ||50 (mayu - strayOviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam apAm|naptrE̱|jaṣaḥ|nAkraḥ|makaraḥ|kulIkaya̍ḥ|tE|akU̍pArasya|vAcE|pai~ggarAja̍ iti# pai~gga-rAjaḥ|BagAya|kuṣIta̍kaḥ|AtI|vAhasaḥ|darvi̍dA|tE|vAyavyA̱ḥ|digBya̍ iti# dik-Byaḥ|cakravAkaḥ||51 (19) (apA - mEkAnnaviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A13)
verses.samhita: apAM naptrE# jaṣO nAkrO makaraḥ̍ kulIkayastE&kUpArasya̍ vAcE pai̱~ggarAjO BagAya̍ kuṣItaka̍ AtI vAhasO̍ darvidA̍ tE vAyavyA̍# digByaścakravAkaḥ||51̍ (apA - mEkAnnaviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam balAya|ajagaraḥ|AKuḥ|sRujayA|śayaṇḍa̍kaḥ|tE|maitrAḥ|mRutyavE̱|asitaḥ|manyavE̱|svaja̍ iti# sva - jaḥ|kuBIMqnasa iti# kuMBI - nasaḥ|puṣkarasAda̍ iti# puṣkara - sAdaḥ|lOhitAhiriti# lOhita-ahiḥ|tE|tvAṣṭrAḥ|pratiśrutkAyA̍ iti# prati - śrutkAyai|vAhasaḥ||52̍ (18)
verses.samhita: balAyAjagara̍ AKuḥ sRujayA̍ śayaṇḍakastE̍ maitrA mRutyavE&sitO̍ manyavE̱ svajaḥ kuMBInasa̍ḥ̍ puṣkarasAdO lOhitAhistE̍ tvAṣṭrAḥ pratiśrutkA̍yai̍ vAhasaḥ||52

verses.padam: - Padam puruṣamRuga iti# puruṣa - mRugaḥ|candramasE|gOdhA|kAla̍kA|dArvAGAṭa̍ iti# dAru-AGAtaḥ|tE|vanaspatInAm|EṇI|ahnE̱|kRuṣṇa̍ḥ|rAtri̍yai|pikaḥ|kṣvi~gkA̱ḥ|nIla̍śIrṣṇIti̍ nIla# - śIrṣṇI|tE|aryamṇE|dhAtuḥ|katkaṭaḥ||53 (18)
verses.samhita: puruṣamRugaścandramasE̍ gOdhA kAlakA̍ dArvAGAṭastE vanaspatInAmEṇyahnE̍ kRuṣṇO rAtriyai̍ pikaḥ kṣvi~gkA nIlaśIrṣṇI̍ tE̱&ryamṇE dhAtuḥ katkaṭaḥ||53̍

verses.padam: - Padam saurI|balAkA̱|Ruśyaḥ|mayUra̍ḥ|śyEnaḥ|tE|gandharvAṇA̱m|vasU̍nAm|kapi~jja̍laḥ|rudrAṇA̱m|tittiriḥ|rOhit|kuṇḍRuṇAcI̱|gOlatti̍kA|tAḥ|aPsarasA̱m|ara̍ṇyAya|sRumaraḥ||54̍ (18)
verses.samhita: saurI balAkarśyO# mayUraḥ̍ śyEnastE gandharvAṇAM̍ ~MvasUnAM̍ kapi~jjalO̍ rudrAṇA̱M tittirI rOhit kuṇḍRuṇAcI̍# gOlattikA̍ tA aPsarasA-mara̍ṇyAya̍ sRumaraḥ||54

verses.padam: - Padam pRuṣataḥ|vaiśvadEva iti# vaiśva - dEvaḥ|pitvaḥ|nya~gkuḥ|kaśa̍ḥ|tE|anu̍matyA̍ ityanu# - matyai|anyavApa ityanya̍ - vApaḥ|ad^^rdhamAsAnAmityad^^rdha̍ - mAsAnA̱m|mAsAm|kaśyapaḥ|kvayi̍ḥ|kuṭaru̍ḥ|dAtyauhaḥ|tE|sinIvAlyai|bRuhaspata̍yE|śitpuṭaḥ||55̍ (18)
verses.samhita: pRuṣatO vai̱śvadEvaḥ pitvO nya~gkuḥ kaśastE&numatyA̍ anyavApO̱&rddhamAsAnA̱M mAsAM kaśyapaḥ kvayiḥ̍ kuṭarurdAtyauhastE̍ sinIvAlyai̍ bRuhaspatayE̍ śitpuṭaḥ||55

verses.padam: - Padam śakA̱|BaumI|pAntraḥ|kaśaḥ|mAnthIlava̍ḥ|tE|pitRuṇAm|RutUnAm|jaha̍kA|saM~MvathsarAyEti̍# saM-vathsarAya|lOpA̱|kapOta̍ḥ|ulU̍kaḥ|śaśaḥ|tE|naiṛqRutA̍ iti# naiḥ - RutAḥ|kRukavAkuḥ|sAvitraḥ||56̍ (18)
verses.samhita: śakA# BaumI pAntraḥ kaśO# mAnthIlavastE pitRuṇAmRu̍tUnAM̍ jahakA̍ saM~MvathsarAya lOpA# kapOta ulUkaḥ̍ śaśastE naṛRutAḥ̍ kRukavAku̍ḥ̍ sAvitraḥ||56

verses.padam: - Padam ruruḥ|raudraḥ|kRukalAsaḥ|śakuni̍ḥ|pippa̍kA|tE|śaravyA̍yai|hariṇaḥ|mArutaḥ|brahma̍ṇE|śArgaḥ|tarakṣu̍ḥ|kRuṣṇaḥ|śvA|caturakṣa̍ iti# catuḥ - akṣaḥ|gardaBaḥ|tE|itarajanAnAmitItara-janAnA̱m|agnayE̱|dhUMkṣṇA̱||57̍ (20) (ruru# - rviṃśatiḥ) (A19)
verses.samhita: rurU# raudraḥ kRukalAsaḥ̍ śakuniḥ pippakA̍ tE śaravyA̍yai̍ hariṇO mArutO̍ brahmaṇE̍ śArgastarakṣuḥ̍ kRuṣṇaḥ śvA caturakṣO̍ gardaBasta̍ itarajanAnA̍magnayE̍ dhU~gkṣṇA̱||57

verses.padam: - Padam alajaḥ|Antarikṣaḥ|udraḥ|madguḥ|plavaḥ|tE|apAm|adityai|haṃqsasAciriti̍# haṃsa - sAciḥ|indrAṇyai|kIṛśA̱|gRudhra̍ḥ|śitikakṣIti̍# śiti - kakṣI|vAd^^rdhrAṇasaḥ|tE|divyAḥ|dyAvApRuthivyEti# dyAvA - pRuthivyA̱|śvAviditi# śva - vit||58 (18)
verses.samhita: alaja A̱ntarikṣa udrO madguḥ plavastE&pAmadi̍tyai̍ haṃsasAcirindrAṇyai̍ kIṛśA gRuddhraḥ̍ śitikakṣI vA̱rddhrAṇasastE divyA dyAvApRuthivyA̱̍ śvAvit||58

verses.padam: - Padam suparṇa iti# su - parṇaḥ|pArjanyaḥ|haṃqsaḥ|vRukaḥ|vRuṣadaṃqśaḥ|tE|aindrAḥ|apAm|udraḥ|aryamṇE|lOpAśaḥ|siṃqhaḥ|nakulaḥ|vyAGraḥ|tE|mahEndrAyEti̍# mahA - indrAya|kAmA̍ya|para̍svAn||59̍ (18)
verses.samhita: suparṇaḥ pA̱rjanyO haṃqsO vRukO# vRuṣadaṃqśasta aindrA apAmudrO̱ &ryamṇE lOpAśaḥ̍ siṃqhO nakulO̍ vyAGrastE mahEndrAya̍ kAmAya̍ parasvAn||59̍

verses.padam: - Padam AgnEyaḥ|kRuṣṇagrIva̍ iti# kRuṣṇa - grIvaḥ|sArasvatI|mEṣI|baBruḥ|saumyaḥ|pauṣṇaḥ|śyAmaḥ|śitipRuṣṭha iti# śiti -pRuṣṭhaḥ|bAṛqhaspatyaḥ|śilpaḥ|vaiśvadEva iti# vaiśva - dEvaḥ|aindraḥ|aruṇaḥ|mArutaḥ|kalmAṣaḥ|aindrAgna̍ ityai̱ndra - agnaḥ|saṃqhita iti# saM - hitaḥ|adhOrAma̍ ityadhaḥ - rAmaḥ|sAvitraḥ|vAruṇaḥ|pEtvaḥ||60̍ (22) (AgnEyO - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A22)
verses.samhita: AgnEyaḥ kRuṣṇagrIvaḥ̍ sArasvatI mEṣI baBruḥ saumyaḥ pauṣṇaḥ śyAmaḥ śitipRuṣṭhO̍ bAṛhaspatyaḥ̍ śilpO vai̱śvadEva aindrO&ruṇO̍ mArutaḥ̍ kalmAṣa# aindrAgnaḥ saṃhitO̍# &dhOrAmaḥ̍ sAvitrO vAruṇaḥ̍ pEtvaḥ||60̍ (AgnEyO - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍

verses.padam: - Padam aśvaḥ|tUparaḥ|gOmRuga̍ iti# gO - mRugaḥ|tE|prAjApatyA iti# prAjA - patyAḥ|AgnEyau|kRuṣṇagrIvAviti̍# kRuṣṇa - grIvau|tvAṣṭrau|lOmaśasakthAviti# lOmaśa - sakthau|śitipRuṣṭhAviti# śiti - pRuṣṭhau|bAṛqhaspatyau|dhAtrE|pRuṣOdara iti# pRuṣa - udaraḥ|sauryaḥ|balakṣaḥ|pEtva̍ḥ||61̍ (16)
verses.samhita: aśvastUparO̍ gOmRugastE̍ prAjApatyA̍ A̱gnEyau kRuṣṇagrIvau̍ tvAṣṭrau lOmaśasakthau̍ śitipRuṣṭhau̍ bAṛhaspatyau̍ dhAtrE pRuṣOdaraḥ̍ sauryO balakṣaḥ pEtvaḥ||61̍

verses.padam: - Padam agnayE̱|anIkavata̍ ityanIka-vatE|rOhi̍tA~jjiriti̍ rOhita-a~jjiḥ|anaḍvAn|adhOrA̍mAvityadhaḥ̍ - rAmau|sAvitrau|pauṣṇau|rajatanABI̍ iti# rajata - nABI|vaiśvadEvAviti# vaiśva-dEvau|piśa~ggau̱|tUparau|mArutaḥ|kalmAṣaḥ|AgnEyaḥ|kRuṣṇaḥ|ajaḥ|sArasvatI|mEṣI|vAruṇaḥ|kRuṣṇaḥ|Eka̍śitipAdityEka̍-śitipAt|pEtva̍ḥ||62̍ (22) (agnayE - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A24) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 24 Anuvaakams :- (yadEkEna̍ - prajApatiḥ̍ prEṇA&nu - yajuṣA - &&pO# - viśvakarmA - &gna A yAhi̍ - suvargAya vajrO# - gAyatrEṇA - gna# udadhE - samIcI - ndrAya̍ - mayu - rapAM - balAya̍ - puruṣamRugaḥ - saurI - pRuṣataḥ̍ - śakA - ruru# - ralajaḥ - suparṇa̍ - A̱gnEyO - &śvO - &gnayE&nIkavatE̍ - caturviṃśatiḥ)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (yadEkEna̍ - sa pApIyA̍ - nEtadvA agnE - rdhanustad - dEvAstvEndrajyEṣṭhA̍ - apAM naptrE - &śvastUparO̍ - dviṣaṣṭiḥ)̍ First and Last Padam of Fifth Prasnam of 5th Kandam (yadEkE - naikaśitipAt̍ pEtvaḥ)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE pa~jcamakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||---------------------------------------
verses.samhita: agnayE&nIkavatE̍ rOhitA~jjiranaḍvAnadhOrA̍mau̍ sAvitrau pauṣṇau rajatanA̍BI̍ vaiśvadEvau piśa~ggau# tUparau mArutaḥ̍ kalmAṣa# AgnEyaḥ kRuṣṇO&jaḥ̍ sArasvatI̍ mEṣI vAruṇaḥ̍ kRuṣṇa EkaśitipAt̍ pEtvaḥ||62̍ (agnayE - dvAviṃśatiḥ)̍ (A24) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 24 anuvAkams :- (yadEkEna̍ - prajApatiḥ̍ prEṇA&nu - yajuṣA - &&pO# - viśvakarmA - &gna A yAhi̍ - suvargAya vajrO# - gAyatrEṇA - gna# udadhE - samIcI - ndrAya̍ - mayu - rapAM - balAya̍ - puruṣamRugaḥ - saurI - pRuṣataḥ̍ - śakA - ruru# - ralajaḥ - suparṇa̍ - A̱gnEyO - &śvO - &gnayE&nIkavatE̍ - caturviṃśatiḥ)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (yadEkEna̍ - sa pApIyA̍ - nEtadvA agnE - rdhanustad - dEvAstvEndrajyEṣṭhA̍ - apAM naptrE - &śvastUparO̍ - dviṣaṣṭiḥ)̍ first and last padam of fifth praśnam of 5th kAṇḍam (yadEkE - naikaśitipAt̍ pEtvaḥ)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pa~jcamakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||------------------------------------ OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 5.6 pa~jcamakAṇḍE ṣaṣṭhaḥ praśnaḥ - upAnuvAkyABidhAnaM
